text: He imanavala'o! Tame allaha mate satya para adaga rahenara bani java, saci ane n'yaya sathe saksi apanara bani java, ko'i komani satruta tamane n'yayana virodha mate na ubhare, n'yaya karata raho je daravani vadhare najika che ane allaha ta'alathi darata raho, kharekhara allaha ta'ala tamara karyone jane che
